GIFT001.message: These roses are just a small reflection of how special you are to me.

GIFT002.message: Wishing you a Rose Day filled with love, warmth, and beautiful moments.

GIFT003.message: Wishing you a Propose Day filled with love, warmth, and beautiful moment.

LETTER001.message: These roses are just a small reflection of how special you are to me. Every moment with you feels like a dream come true. Your kindness, your laughter, your beautiful soul - they inspire me every single day.

LETTER002.message: Wishing you a Rose Day filled with love, warmth, and beautiful moments. You make every day brighter just by being in it. I promise to love you, support you, and be by your side through everything.

LETTER003.message: Wishing you a Propose Day filled with love, warmth, and beautiful moments. Will you be mine forever? I've been waiting to say this right - to let it settle between us like morning light.

messages.heartTap: Every little thing about you makes my heart smile.
messages.finalMessage: I don't need a special day to love you. But I'll choose you every day anyway ‚ù§Ô∏è

messages.heartTap: You're the most beautiful part of my day.
messages.finalMessage: Every moment with you feels like forever

messages.heartTap: Loving you is the best decision I've ever made.

VROSE001.message: Wishing you a Propose Day filled with love, warmth, and beautiful moments. Will you be mine forever? I've been waiting to say this right - to let it settle between us like morning light.

messages.heartTap: Every moment with you is pure magic.
messages.finalMessage: You make my heart feel like it's home ‚ù§Ô∏è
